tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Bone age Xrays interpreted accurately,Growth & Development Evaluation / Management,Nutritional,
review: Dr pays attention to details and examines the patient thoroughly. Also, explained the health condition and did not leave us in doubt. This is what matters the most to me. So its worth the wait time. Also, the suggested tests were apt. Most importantly, Dr was friendly with the patient (my daughter). My daughter was happy to go for the second consultation as well after a few days.Overall we're satisfied with the treatment. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Thyroid Disease in Children,Childhood Infections,Pediatric Vaccinations,
review: Dr. Anjana Hulse is very soft spoken and listens to us in a very polite way and patiently.. explains us in detail about the issue and the medication.. one best thing about her is she always makes the babies/kids to feel comfort before checking and starting with the treatment.. she is easily reachable as well when needed ...Best pediatristian to have for our kids...

review: Friendly doctor satisfaction solution given by doctor is very supportive for my wife hope is there for people when u ll meet dr anjana husale madam realy superb supportive doctor

*** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ******* Most important for a pediatrician is to be calm and very friendly while talking to their patient. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are having our child today because of Dr. Anjana Ma'am. My kid was diagnosed with RBS 360  in the evening and we rushed to apollo hospital.  luckily emergency doctors called Dr. Anjana. kid was admitted in ICU and after two days discharged. he was diagnosed with type 1 and she explained very well how to control sugar levels. she educated us very well. No words to describe her...
